articles.description: In the build-up to the US Open, eventual men's champion Jannik Sinner was cleared of fault or negligence over two failed doping tests. Yet questions remain over the case.
articles.title: Jannik Sinner: Does doping case leave cloud hanging over US Open victory?

articles.description: Follow live text updates and listen to BBC Radio 5 Live commentary as England face Finland at Wembley Stadium in the Nations League.
articles.title: England v Finland: Best person should get England job, says Lee Carsley, as Harry Kane reaches 100 caps

articles.description: Joe Root admits England did not play their best cricket against Sri Lanka, but “Coldplay can’t be number one every week”.
articles.title: Joe Root on England loss: 'Even Coldplay can't be number one every week'

articles.description: Tammy Beaumont's unbeaten 150 helps England thrash Ireland in the second ODI and take an unassailable 2-0 series lead.
articles.title: Ireland vs England: Tammy Beaumont scores 150 not out as visitors seal series win

articles.description: The Dallas Cowboys, Chicago Bears and Miami Dolphins all enjoy wins on a dramatic opening Sunday of the NFL on and off the field.
articles.title: NFL Results & Week One recap: Prescot, Williams & Hill in the news as Dallas Cowboys, Chicago Bears & Miami Dolphins win

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Montenegro v Wales in the Uefa Nations League.
articles.title: Montenegro v Wales: Uefa Nations League - BBC Sport

articles.description: Liverpool goalkeeper Caoimhin Kelleher says he wants to leave Anfield to prove himself with the club seemingly having chosen to go "in a different direction".
articles.title: Caoimhin Kelleher: Liverpool goalkeeper wants to leave Anfield after Giorgi Mamardashvili signing

articles.description: Portugal 2-1 Scotland: 'Cristiano Ronaldo rages on to eclipse Scott McTominay heroics'
articles.title: Portugal 2-1 Scotland: 'Cristiano Ronaldo rages on to eclipse Scott McTominay heroics'

articles.description: US Open semi-finalist Jack Draper leads Great Britain's squad which is bidding to reach the Davis Cup finals.
articles.title: Davis Cup: Jack Draper 'working hard to get fit' after US Open

articles.description: The club enters a partnership with local councils as part of plans to redevelop Old Trafford.
articles.title: Manchester United new stadium plans move forward
